summary: As a highly motivated and skilled developer with over two years of experience working with React and Python, I am eager to bring my knowledge and expertise to a challenging and dynamic environment. With a strong foundation in both front-end and back-end development, I am confident in my ability to design and implement efficient and effective solutions for a variety of projects. In my previous role, I worked on a variety of projects, including the development of user-friendly interfaces and the integration of APIs to enhance the functionality of applications. I am a quick learner and always looking to improve my skills, and I am excited to continue growing and expanding my knowledge as a junior developer. In my current role, I have been responsible for designing and implementing efficient and effective solutions for a range of projects. I am skilled in using various tools and technologies, including React, Redux, and webpack, and I am always looking to improve my skills and stay up-to-date with the latest developments in the field.

experience.description: Responsible for the design of an internal web application focusing on both the user interface by utilizing Material-UI design patterns and API integration with existing Amazon libraries.

Starting as an intern, I took a hands-on approach to master frameworks, languages, and software services. This dedication resulted in quickly advancing into a full-time position, working on client-facing corporate contracts. My final project was developing an enterprise financial application utilizing proprietary algorithms developed by the team to conduct automated stock trades.

I provided exclusive scoops to businesses to leverage new information in closing contracts and making necessary adaptations to follow market trends. Working with  I routinely pulled from and helped maintain a database of over one million entries. Alongside this I researched financial information within records from the IRS and notated any changes in the financial status of companies with the database.

education.program: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science and Mathematics

education.schoolName: University of Virginia's College at Wise
